localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Listen to top-trending web articles, read in a natural voice while you wash the dishes or laundry, cook, commute or just relax. Staying up-to-date on your favourite topics has never been easier. Ideas for your SEO blog, or improve English. We got podcasts too!
nodes.title: Newsly - Listen to a personalized choice of web content & podcasts
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Six months ago, we asked GPT-3 to generate Tinder openers that we then bundled into a book. They were funny and surprisingly practical. Now with Copyhat, you can also have this powerful language model as a wingman in your pocket.
nodes.title: Copyhat - Say goodbye to boring Tinder openers with your AI wingbot
nodes.author: Jan A. Kolar

nodes.excerpt: Learn a new language with Chatterbug Streams, the first app for learning Spanish, French and German through interactive live streams. Watch Peloton-like live streams tailored to your level with real-time quizzes and polls.
nodes.title: Chatterbug Streams - Learn a new language with live streamed classes
nodes.author: Scott Chacon

nodes.excerpt: Help for anxiety & depression. Online provider visits, care counseling, and prescriptions delivered to your door. https://getcerebral.com/
nodes.title: Cerebral - Online expert help for anxiety, depression, and insomnia
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Discover the cost of charging your Tesla. Generate detailed reports, gain insight into your real consumption costs and include charging costs in your company's accounting. All for free.
nodes.title: EEVEE - Tesla EV charging app to track & manage charging costs

nodes.excerpt: Spot is a geographic video sharing app that finds and shares undiscovered places across the globe. Recorded videos will automatically be pinned on the map without manually tagging them. Start sharing â€” your ordinary life can be someone elseâ€™s extraordinary.
nodes.title: Spot - Map-based video sharing app

nodes.excerpt: Whether you need anonymous emotional support, space to vent, or even just someone to talk to without judgment or biasâ€”your Buddyâ€™s here for you. The LonePack Buddy app gives you a platform to discuss anything at any time completely free of cost.
nodes.title: LonePack Buddy - A free mental health peer support app

nodes.excerpt: Gotrade allows anyone in the world to invest commission free in fractional shares of US stocks with ease. With Gotrade, anyone can invest as little as $1 into the largest companies globally like Tesla, Apple & Amazon. Not available to US, CA & BR residents.
nodes.title: Gotrade - Fractional US stock investing for anyone in the world
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Evolve is a simple cash back app that helps you earn cash back automatically from your day to day spending with your debit card. With Evolve, every spending from your debit card can earn you automatic cash back. Evolve also offers exclusive cash back offers.
nodes.title: Evolve - Connect your card and earn up to 15% automatic cash back
nodes.author: George Pu

nodes.excerpt: Plain Sight is the future of work connections. Think LinkedIn meets FourSquare. We curate connections between remote workers based on their skills and interests, both virtually and at in-person spaces. No more missed opportunities to make relevant connections.
nodes.title: Plain Sight - Make relevant connections wherever you go
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Your personal shopping companion with integrated recipes, loyalty cards and shopping suggestions â€“ Get the brand new version 4.0.0 of the all-in-one shopping list app now for free! Available for iOS, Android, web, voice and smartwatch & tablet!
nodes.title: Bring! - The simplest shopping list for sharing

nodes.excerpt: * The Factual app delivers unbiased news on critical topics. * Just the facts: A.I.-driven ratings uncover the most objective stories across the political spectrum. * Save time: Daily briefing on top 5 topics with full context: charts, summaries, reader polls.
nodes.title: The Factual News App - The most objective stories on critical topics
nodes.author: Arjun Moorthy

nodes.excerpt: Time is a limited resource - and to spend it efficiently going forward the first step is to know how you spend it right now. That's what Trac! helps you to do.
nodes.title: Trac! - Record your time with ease
nodes.author: Mudit Gulati

nodes.excerpt: eezy is your new lifestyle planner! Driven by artificial intelligence, eezy connects you to things to do and new friends to enjoy them with, all based on your psychological profile, preferences, and current mood. Optimize your free time and start living eezy!
nodes.title: eezy - Daily adventures for ambitious people
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: A simple coffee calculator to help you brew a great cup of coffee with whatever measurements you have available. Use grams, cups, fluid ounces, or tablespoons to calculate either water or beans for your ideal brew ratio.
nodes.title: Brew Ratio - A simple coffee calculator to help you brew a great cup
nodes.author: Matt Shwery

nodes.excerpt: Clubhouse is a space for casual, drop-in audio conversations - with friends and other interesting people around the world. Go online anytime to chat with the people you follow or hop in as a listener and hear what others are talking about.

nodes.excerpt: Share your thoughts on Movies & TV with rich content and a community of those that share your undefinable taste. Create Collections, add to your Watchlist and never settle with that show you've binged twice already.
nodes.title: Stamp Social - Introducing the social way to watch movies
